A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Didn't enjoy it. 80% of the movie felt like filler and it's awful at being subtle.Whatever happened to "show\, don't tell"? 

It'd be easier to type out the stuff that I liked:

Being introduced to more of the creatures which inhabit the universe; they were all very well done in their designs and mannerisms.

DJ scenes.

The shots of Luke standing alone before the AT-ATs.

Some of the small touches of humour.

Yup\, that's it. A film for diehard fans only.
